description:
A compact light that you’ll hardly notice, but those around you won’t miss. Tucking neatly into your cockpit, the Zecto Drive is a brilliant little light that has 7 eye-catching modes. Outfitted with 3 LEDs sitting behind custom engineered reflectors, the Zecto creates a wide, even flood light. Side light ports make merging and lane changes a bit safer. And USB charging means there’s never a good reason to ride with a low battery.

  • Front light has 7 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 4 in flashing; steady: 80 lumens (3.5h), 40 lumens (6h), 15 lumens (11.5h), flash 1 – 50 lumens (15.5h), flash 2 – 25 lumens (13.5h), flash 3 – 50 lumens (6.25h), and day flash–250 lumens (4.5h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each LED for maximum flood lighting
  • Cut-outs behind the bezel provide side illumination, keeping you seen from the side
  • USB charging makes it easy to always have a full battery – full charging takes ~3 hours per light
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps fit handlebars and let you swap between bikes with ease
  • Integrated clip to mount it to a pack or a dog collar
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Zecto Drive Front Light
